name: Polterheist (itch) (Binary Shred)
description:
You are a poltergeist and you want to get your hat back! Use your ghostly powers to progress. Don't get spotted!

---

A submission for the Moray Game Jam 2019, in which the theme was 'Seeing is Believing'.

Made within 48 hours.

---

Everything was made by myself aside from the music.

'Rebel With Dangerous Ideas' is from the album 'evereffervescent' by HALLEY LABS.
